vote.title: Authorize (1) a Project Funding Agreement with Dallas County, County Transportation Major Capital Improvement Projects 10233, for trail design of Phase 1 of the Trinity Forest Spine Trail from the Santa Fe Trail just north of Tenison Park Golf Course to the Dallas Area Rapid Transit Lawnview Station located at 5900 Scyene Road; (2) the receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $500,000.00 from Dallas County for the County's share of the project cost in the Capital Gifts, Donation and Development Fund; (3) the establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $500,000.00 in the Capital Gifts, Donation and Development Fund; and (4) execution of the agreement including all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information for potential future costs)
vote.description: Authorize (1) a Project Funding Agreement with Dallas County, County Transportation Major Capital Improvement Projects 10233, for trail design of Phase 1 of the Trinity Forest Spine Trail from the Santa Fe Trail just north of Tenison Park Golf Course to the Dallas Area Rapid Transit Lawnview Station located at 5900 Scyene Road; (2) the receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $500,000.00 from Dallas County for the County's share of the project cost in the Capital Gifts, Donation and Development Fund; (3) the establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $500,000.00 in the Capital Gifts, Donation and Development Fund; and (4) execution of the agreement including all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information for potential future costs)
